mapper.select: select distinct m.id as id,m.menu_name as menuName,m.menu_super_id as menuSuperId,m.menu_icon as menuIcon ,m.menu_super_id as pid,m.menu_url as url,m.menu_external as external,m.menu_fresh as fresh ,m.menu_icon as icon,m.menu_open as open,m.menu_rel as rel,m.menu_target as target from sy_role_menu rm,sy_menu m where rm.menu_id=m.id and m.menu_super_id = '0' and rm.role_id in(select r.id from sy_role r,sy_user_role ur where ur.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r.id=ur.role_id) order by m.menu_sort asc

select distinct m.id as id,m.menu_name as menuName,m.menu_super_id as menuSuperId,m.menu_icon as menuIcon ,m.menu_super_id as pid,m.menu_url as url,m.menu_external as external,m.menu_fresh as fresh ,m.menu_icon as icon,m.menu_open as open,m.menu_rel as rel,m.menu_target as target from sy_role_menu rm,sy_menu m where rm.menu_id=m.id and m.menu_super_id = '0' and m.menu_status = 1 and rm.role_id in(select r.id from sy_role r,sy_user_role ur where ur.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r.id=ur.role_id) order by m.menu_sort asc

select distinct m.* from sy_role_menu rm,sy_menu m where rm.menu_id=m.id and m.menu_status = 1 and rm.role_id in(select r.id from sy_role r,sy_user_role ur where ur.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r.id=ur.role_id) order by m.menu_sort asc
